SELECT r.RECRUITMENT_NO, r.MAX_PARTICIPANTS, r.RECRUITMENT_STATUS, r.REC_CREATED_DATE, r.REC_END_DATE, r.REGION, r.PRODUCT_URL, r.QR_CODE, r.BOARD_NO, bt.BOARD_CD, b.BOARD_TITLE AS productName, p.PRODUCT_PRICE, p.PRODUCT_COUNT, p.DELIVERY_FEE, p.READ_COUNT, p.CATEGORY_NO,
(SELECT mp.MEMBER_NICK FROM RECRUITMENT_PARTICIPANT rp JOIN MEMBER mp ON rp.MEMBER_NO = mp.MEMBER_NO WHERE rp.RECRUITMENT_NO = r.RECRUITMENT_NO ORDER BY rp.JOIN_DATE ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY) AS hostName,
(SELECT mp.MEMBER_GRADE FROM RECRUITMENT_PARTICIPANT rp JOIN MEMBER mp ON rp.MEMBER_NO = mp.MEMBER_NO WHERE rp.RECRUITMENT_NO = r.RECRUITMENT_NO ORDER BY rp.JOIN_DATE ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY) AS hostGrade,
(SELECT I.IMG_PATH || I.IMG_RENAME FROM IMG I WHERE I.IMG_TYPE_NO = B.BOARD_NO AND I.IMG_LEVEL = 0 AND I.IMG_TYPE = 2 FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY) AS thumbnail
FROM RECRUITMENT_ROOM r JOIN BOARD b ON r.BOARD_NO = b.BOARD_NO JOIN BOARD_TYPE bt ON b.BOARD_CD = bt.BOARD_CD JOIN PRODUCT p ON b.BOARD_NO = p.BOARD_NO WHERE bt.BOARD_CD = 1 AND b.BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY r.REC_CREATED_DATE DESC

SELECT r.RECRUITMENT_NO, r.MAX_PARTICIPANTS, r.RECRUITMENT_STATUS, r.REC_CREATED_DATE, r.REC_END_DATE, r.REGION, r.PRODUCT_URL, r.QR_CODE, r.BOARD_NO, bt.BOARD_CD, b.BOARD_TITLE AS productName, p.PRODUCT_PRICE, p.PRODUCT_COUNT, p.DELIVERY_FEE, p.READ_COUNT, p.CATEGORY_NO, b.BOARD_DEL_FL,
(SELECT mp.MEMBER_NICK FROM RECRUITMENT_PARTICIPANT rp JOIN MEMBER mp ON rp.MEMBER_NO = mp.MEMBER_NO WHERE rp.RECRUITMENT_NO = r.RECRUITMENT_NO ORDER BY rp.JOIN_DATE ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY) AS hostName,
(SELECT mp.MEMBER_GRADE FROM RECRUITMENT_PARTICIPANT rp JOIN MEMBER mp ON rp.MEMBER_NO = mp.MEMBER_NO WHERE rp.RECRUITMENT_NO = r.RECRUITMENT_NO ORDER BY rp.JOIN_DATE ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY) AS hostGrade,
(SELECT I.IMG_PATH || I.IMG_RENAME FROM IMG I WHERE I.IMG_TYPE_NO = b.BOARD_NO AND I.IMG_LEVEL = 0 AND I.IMG_TYPE = 2 FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY) AS thumbnail
FROM RECRUITMENT_ROOM r JOIN BOARD b ON r.BOARD_NO = b.BOARD_NO JOIN BOARD_TYPE bt ON b.BOARD_CD = bt.BOARD_CD JOIN PRODUCT p ON b.BOARD_NO = p.BOARD_NO WHERE bt.BOARD_CD = 1 AND b.BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY p.READ_COUNT DESC
SELECT I.IMG_NO, I.IMG_PATH, I.IMG_RENAME, I.IMG_ORIGINAL, I.IMG_LEVEL, I.IMG_TYPE, I.IMG_TYPE_NO FROM IMG I WHERE I.IMG_TYPE IN (6,7,8) ORDER BY I.IMG_LEVEL ASC

SELECT RR.RECRUITMENT_NO, RR.RECRUITMENT_STATUS, RR.REC_CREATED_DATE, RR.REC_END_DATE, RP.JOIN_DATE, RP.CANCEL_DATE, RR.MAX_PARTICIPANTS, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RECRUITMENT_PARTICIPANT RP WHERE RP.RECRUITMENT_NO = RR.RECRUITMENT_NO) AS CURRENT_PARTICIPANTS, B.BOARD_TITLE AS PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRODUCT_PRICE, P.PRODUCT_COUNT, M.MEMBER_NICK, M.MEMBER_ADDR, M.POINT, M.MEMBER_GRADE, M.PROFILE_IMG FROM RECRUITMENT_ROOM RR JOIN BOARD B ON RR.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO JOIN PRODUCT P ON B.BOARD_NO = P.BOARD_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON RR.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO LEFT JOIN RECRUITMENT_PARTICIPANT RP ON RR.RECRUITMENT_NO = RP.RECRUITMENT_NO WHERE RR.BOARD_NO IN (SELECT BOARD_NO FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_CD = 1 AND BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N') AND (RR.MEMBER_NO = #{member_no} OR RP.MEMBER_NO = #{member_no}) ORDER BY RR.RECRUITMENT_NO DESC
